jdbcService.sql: update component_relation_type set db_modified_utc = timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), role_id = case when :roleId is null then role_id else :roleId end, component_id = case when :componentId is null then component_id else :componentId end, relation_type_id = case when :relationTypeId is null then relation_type_id else :relationTypeId end where id = :id
